title: We Are Fucking Fucked
lyrics:
[Intro]
(We play it together)
[Verse 1]
You really believe
We can survive all of this?
The black vacuum of the universe, it was designed
To swallow us whole
It's a losing game
[Pre-Chorus]
We're at death's door
, 
another world war
Wildfires and earthquakes I foresaw
A life in crisis, a deadly virus
Tsunamis of hate are gonna find us
[Chorus]
Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah
We are fucking fucked
Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah
We are fucking fucked
[Pre-Chorus]
We're at death's door, 
another world war
Wildfires and earthquakes I foresaw
A life in crisis, mutated virus
Tsunamis of hate are gonna drown us

[Chorus]
Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah
We are fucking fucked
Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah
We are fucking fucked
[Verse 2]
True, just when you think
You are safe and secure
You'll forget what you need to remember, living in peace
But you're living a lie
The game is rigged
[Pre-Chorus]
We're at death's door, 
another world war
Wildfires and earthquakes I foresaw
A life in crisis, mutated virus
Tsunamis of hate are gonna drown us
[Chorus]
Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah
We are fucking fucked
Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah
We are fucking fucked
[Bridge]
Hole up
Stockpile
Hoard up
We are getting fucking fucked

[Guitar Solo]
[Chorus]
Ah, ah, ah-ah
We are getting fucked
Ah, ah, ah-ah
We are getting fucked
[Outro]
Hey, hey, hey, fuck off
Hey, hey, hey, stockpile
Hey, hey, hey, fuck off
Hey, hey, we are getting fucking fucked
